snippet: Preservationists are fighting what they consider shortsighted decisions to sell architecturally distinctive post office buildings.
abstract: Preservationists are fighting what they consider shortsighted decisions by financially strapped Postal Service to sell architecturally distinctive post office buildings; eleven historic post offices are already on market across country and dozens more may be sold.
lead_paragraph: Preservationists are fighting what they consider shortsighted decisions to sell architecturally distinctive post office buildings.

headline.seo: Preservationists Fight Postal Service Over Sales
headline.main: Post Office Buildings With Character, and Maybe a Sale Price
headline.print_headline: Post Office Buildings With Character, and Maybe a Sale Price
